rule_sets.subdivision: Electric motors and generators (excluding generating sets)

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which:

- the value of all the materials used does not exceed **40%** of the ex-works price of the product, *and*

- within the above limit, the value of all the materials of [heading 8503](/headings/8503) used does not exceed **10%** of the ex-works price of the product.
Manufacture in which the value of all the materials used does not exceed **30%** of the ex-works price of the product.
